price: Nokorε sε, na Abraham yε ͻman anaa onipa a yεhwε no sua ne soͻ; ͻbrεε ne ho ase demaa Nyankopͻn, na ͻtene, na na ͻnka abosomsomfoͻ no ho.
arabic: إِنَّ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ كَانَ أُمَّةٗ قَانِتٗا لِّلَّهِ حَنِيفٗا وَلَمۡ يَكُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: inna ib'rāhīma kāna ummatan qānitan lillahi ḥanīfan walam yaku mina al-mush'rikīna
